Ability.Name: Hyrotii YH-12

Description.OldValue:
Activates the Hyrotti YH-12, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Snowline Vorn Tiger
Ability.Description: Summons a small Snowline Vorn Tiger which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Giradda's Special Pet Nexu
Ability.Description:
Summons the Giradda's Special Pet Nexu creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Zakuul Personal Dropship
Ability.Description:
Activates the Zakuul Personal Dropship, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%
